attributes.action: Save Ferguslie Thread Works Half Time School
attributes.additional_details: A petition to Save The Half Time School, Paisley and bring it into Community Ownership. The building is B listed and has lay derelict and now in ruins for nearly 17 years, With developers coming and going with no interest. The building is deep in Paisley's History and deserves to be saved ! We want the government to bring it into community ownership to allow restoration sympathetic and not just be redeveloped into flats like all the other Historic Buildings in Paisley
